parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description: The ID of the master instance.

parameters.name: ClusterIds
parameters.description: An array of JSON strings. The JSON strings in the array indicate the IDs of the associated clusters in which the policy instance is deployed.

parameters.name: PolicyAction
parameters.description:
The action of the policy. Valid values:

*   deny: blocks deployments that match the policy.
*   warn: generates alerts for deployments that match the policy.
